name: Family cobweb
description:
Difficult life, unjust, gangster world ... All this sends the hero into wandering around the world and all for revenge.

You have to find out how much the web of these mafia families is tangled....

“Family cobweb" is a drama visual novel featuring:

- A deep and heartbreaking storyline that touches many interesting themes and topics

- Brilliant art style, backgrounds and sprites

- Awesome background music
